name: A Legacy Reborn
description:
This is a simple game I made for my entry into GDN Game Jam 2021, on the theme of "Rebirth." In this game, you will guide a family as they rebuild their ancestral home. 

There's a lot of things I wanted to do, but simply didn't have the time to work out, especially working solo. Also the characters are spheres, which is the limit of my capabilities -- I mean, uh, is a stylistic artistic decision in order to allow the player to project any image they prefer onto it. Yeah, we're gonna go with that. 

Controls are WASD/arrow keys to move, X to interact, LMB to click some buttons, and you can press Q to bring the main menu back up (doesn't quit the game, your progress is safe until you leave the web page)
